testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by modern businesses and creative professionals.

reviews.name: George Brock
reviews.text: Filip is a talented and determined young entrepreneur with a passion for marketing. He quickly understands strategies, knows how to translate them into practice, and comes up with innovative ideas that lead to excellent results.

reviews.name: Jakub Hes
reviews.text: I just want to quickly give a shoutout to my man Filip. Working with him was an absolute joy. He responded incredibly fast and had a great eye for detail. I can warmly recommend Filip.

reviews.name: Martin G.
reviews.text: I had a moment to look through your portfolio and I feel pride that we have such students at our grammar school — hats off!

error404.title: Lost in Space
error404.desc: The page you are looking for has drifted away or never existed in this dimension.

matrace-letovice.title: Matrace Letovice
matrace-letovice.desc: A custom product catalog for a premium mattress manufacturer.
matrace-letovice.fullDesc: This project involved creating a robust digital catalog for a high-end mattress manufacturer. The goal was to replace a traditional offline catalog with a modern, high-performance web solution that allows customers to explore products in detail. Built on WordPress for easy content management by the client, but optimized with custom frontend tweaks for a premium feel.
matrace-letovice.clientGoal: Present premium mattresses in a professional digital catalog to build brand authority and replace outdated paper brochures with a searchable, high-end online experience.

process.title: Research
process.desc: Analyzing material textures and product USPs.

process.title: Wireframing
process.desc: Structuring the catalog for easy navigation.

process.title: Design
process.desc: Creating a visual system reflecting comfort and quality.

process.title: Optimization
process.desc: SEO and performance tuning for instant loading.

designDecisions: Large, high-quality imagery to emphasize material quality.
Clean grid layout for easy product comparison.
Calming color palette reflecting home comfort.
Strong focus on readability and accessibility.
technicalImplementation: Custom Post Types for product management

jakub-hes.title: Jakub Hes
jakub-hes.desc: Professional portfolio and branding for a visual artist.
jakub-hes.fullDesc: Jakub Hes required a minimalist yet impactful digital home for his copywriting and visual work. The project focused on 'white space' and typography to let his creative work speak for itself. We implemented smooth page transitions and a custom CMS structure to allow Jakub to update his portfolio seamlessly.
jakub-hes.clientGoal: Create a digital home that highlights creative copy and visual projects while establishing professional credibility for high-end copywriting clients.

process.title: Workshop
process.desc: Defining the creative direction and voice.

process.title: Minimalism
process.desc: Removing noise to let the work speak.

process.title: CMS Tuning
process.desc: Tailoring the admin area for easy updates.

designDecisions: Minimalist layout to avoid visual distraction from copy.
Strong typography hierarchy for effortless reading.
Large white space to create an editorial feel.
Neutral color palette to keep focus on the work.
technicalImplementation: Custom Post Types for portfolio entries
Dynamic template system for various work types

imphreco.title: Imphreco
imphreco.desc: Innovative digital branding and interface design.
imphreco.fullDesc: Imphreco is a project at the cutting edge of digital branding. The focus was on creating a visual identity that felt futuristic and tech-forward. We developed a series of interactive components and a unique navigation system that reflects the brand's innovative approach to its industry.
imphreco.clientGoal: Build an innovative and tech-forward digital brand identity that stands out in a crowded market and builds immediate trust with tech clients.

process.title: Architecture
process.desc: Setting up a scalable React environment.

designDecisions: Futuristic aesthetic with vibrant glowing accents.
Dark mode by default for a high-tech studio feel.
Interactive micro-animations to increase engagement.
Non-standard layouts to reflect innovation.
technicalImplementation: Framer Motion for complex layout animations
Tailwind CSS for responsive design systems
Optimized asset loading for WebGL integration

veronika-kavanova.title: Veronika Kavanová
veronika-kavanova.fullDesc: A dedicated project focusing on high-end portrait photography for Veronika Kavanová. The goal was to capture personality through light and shadow, resulting in a series of powerful, storytelling images used for professional branding and personal collections.
veronika-kavanova.clientGoal: Capture a professional and diverse set of portraits that communicate both personality and professionalism for personal branding.

process.title: Concept
process.desc: Defining the mood and lighting style.

process.title: Scouting
process.desc: Selecting locations that match the vision.

process.title: Shooting
process.desc: Executing the session with Nikon Z Series.

process.title: Retouch
process.desc: Fine-tuning details for a polished finish.

designDecisions: Cinematic lighting to create depth and drama.
Focus on eyes and expression for emotional connection.
Natural skin tones with stylized color grading.
Varied compositions from close-ups to environmental.
technicalImplementation: Prime lenses for maximum sharpness and bokeh
Digital delivery optimized for web and print

product-photoshooting.title: Product Photoshooting
product-photoshooting.fullDesc: A collection of commercial product shoots, highlighted by the 'Samolepící výztužná páska' project. These shoots require extreme attention to detail, texture, and technical lighting to showcase products in their best possible light for e-commerce and catalog use.
product-photoshooting.clientGoal: Highlight product textures and technical details to increase customer confidence and drive sales in catalog environments.

process.title: Multi-angle
process.desc: Showing the product from all relevant sides.

designDecisions: Sharp focus across the entire product plane.
Neutral backgrounds to avoid brand conflict.
Specific lighting to show material thickness.
High-contrast grading for technical clarity.
technicalImplementation: Macro lens specialized for detail capture

wildlife-hub.title: Wildlife Hub
wildlife-hub.fullDesc: Wildlife Hub is an ongoing passion project dedicated to capturing the raw beauty of the natural world. From birds in flight to macro insect photography, this project pushes the limits of patience and technical skill in the field.
wildlife-hub.clientGoal: Capture the unstaged, raw beauty of nature to inspire conservation and appreciation for the natural world.

process.title: Fieldwork
process.desc: Spending hours in position for the shot.

process.title: Authenticity
process.desc: Prioritizing natural moments over staged shots.

process.title: Atmosphere
process.desc: Enhancing the natural lighting in post.

designDecisions: Wide compositions to show habitat context.
Tight crops to show animal emotion.
Natural color palette to maintain authenticity.
Focus on unique, fleeting moments.
